ROM.Changelog:
##### Android 8.0.1 - Mx5 Build 18.5.26 Full details are available on our official blog.
* **MxUI version 5.1.3** * **The June security patch** * **Performance tweaks and improvements** * **Change of application icons** * Addition of a Bluelight Filter * Replaced Flipboard Briefing with Google News * User experience improvements
**Updates to the following applications:**
* AndroidFrameworkRes - MX5.1_2018B_20180526 * BluelightFilterCore - 20180526 * CSCAppResource - 5.1.3_20180526 * SystemUI - MX5.1_2018A_20180526 * TouchWizHome - 2018B_Hybrid_20180526
**Notes:**
* Users with a custom icon pack may have to re-apply it after updating * You may have to re-organize your quick settings panel after updating * Google News only installs on Mx5 installations with Google Apps (Gapps) installed.
**If you download updates over a data connection or while roaming, additional data charges may apply. It is advised to keep your device fully charged during the update.**
